alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 3:50PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Storm Impacting West Coast of Alaska Friday... A strong storm bringing winds, snow and blowing snow will move north over the West Coast of Alaska on Friday. There is a possibility that this storm could bring blizzard conditions to the West Coast Friday into Saturday. This could also bring a slight chance of freezing rain to areas south of Nome on Friday. A weaker storm will move north over the West Coast on Thursday, but that storm will only bring light snow on Thursday and Thursday night.
